subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Nicklas Backstrom scored three goals to help Washington rally from a 4-1 deficit, and Michael Ryder and Zdeno Chara scored two minutes apart in the third period for Boston.
snippet: Nicklas Backstrom scored three goals to help Washington rally from a 4-1 deficit, and Michael Ryder and Zdeno Chara scored two minutes apart in the third period for Boston.
